extendedInfo.description: Download the new Flirtomatic app to find and flirt with millions of real people wherever you are. Get flirting in 20 seconds and you could find a new friend or date today!Super features include:â¢ Search and location service including GPS to find the flirty hot spotsâ¢ Check into your favorite hot spots & meet people thereâ¢ View millions of pictures & private photosâ¢ Live one 2 one chat, including winks, kisses and supersnogsâ¢ Top up your wallet "on the go" for additional features such as "Look at Me" bids or gifts. These are extras on the site that we charge for but you're under no obligation to spend.WHY FLIRTOMATIC? Check out what OUR FANS SAY:by JamesReally good. Chatted to at least 10 girls in a day!*****by aileenWorks perfect on my android! Flirtin made easier!*****by annetteBeware! Its addictive, full of fun flirting!*****If you've enjoyed Flirtomatic please support us with your 5-star ratings!Follow us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/FlirtomaticFollow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/FlirtomaticUKEnjoy!

reviews.title: People can\'t make conversation on here
reviews.comment: Ive used the website but the app is better in some ways -easier to find way around and block people, but u cannot delete messages. If you\'re a girl expect to get bombarded with how r u s and very crude chat up lines. If you\'re looking for a girl, you won\'t hear much. There r some spam bots. Does not adhere to its own guidelines.sometimes wants you to visit porn sites on signing in and candy crush always on exiting app.
